author: warren c
title: Casablanca hotel near Times Square New York -
text: An excellent small family hotel near the heart of Times Square in New York City. Helpful,friendly staff. Good rooms and home comforts to hand. Reasonable breakfasts with coffee,tea, cakes served 24 hours. A special mention to Frank on reception for all his help and advice.and for making that special extra effort. Made my friend and myself's birthdays special and memorable.
